> I suggest that you use the =

the user manual here:

http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/con=

fixes within the

> LinkScoper rules on which =
extracted (not scheduled) links, of a crawled 
> URI, are within the scope.=
 Links that are not in the scope are 
> disregarded. The links that are in =
the scope are "promoted" to 
> CandidateURIs (if not CandidateURIs already)=
 and later scheduled to be 
> crawled.
> 
> The decide rules of the LinkSco=
per itself simply decide if the
> LinkScoper will be skipped the next proce=
ssor in the processor chain
or not.

lieve that getting ClassCastException 
> errors is to be expected.  The ext=
ractors create Link and not 
> CandidateURI links needed by Scheduler. Howe=
ver, if you use your own 
> extractors that create CAndidateURI links, skip=
ping the LinkScoper

led.
